jobInfo.postDescription:
Job Description
Primary Responsibility 

Be responsible for areas including but not limited to data quality control, data validation/simulation and client enquiries in FMCG industry based on data analytical skill and fundamental statistical knowledge. 

Implement the projects/tasks on schedule with highly quality 

Serves as expertise for operation function, ensure goals assigned are met. 

Cooperate with cross team peers under Operation and Tech team, identifies the key risks or potential issues for the projects.  

Serves as the initiator to solve the issues, prepare the backup plan and monitor it to ensure on time delivery 

Qualifications
Qualification 

Bachelor/Master degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science, social science, market research, operation is preferred 

2-3 years market analytical/modeling/operation experience 

 

Hard Skill and knowledge 

Good understanding with a programming language like SQL, R, Python, VBA or SAS and/ or experience in one or more areas in market database setup, data extraction, data cleaning and validation 

Familiar with MS office (Excel, PPT) 

Language - Fluent written and spoken English. 

Good understanding in FMCG market 

Good judgment based on market facts and translating statistical concept into data application 

 

Soft Skill 

Multi task Management and anti-pressure ability  

Strong Analytic skill based on data support and clear logic 

Communication – clarify needs, excellent written and verbal communication skills, to present clear messages from complex information/data to all peers internally and externally. 

Continuous improvement mindset and proactive attitude
jobInfo.address: 上海静安区捷孚凯市场咨询上海市静安区恒丰路436号环智国际大厦2801-02室

brandComInfo.introduce:
NIQ是全球领先的消费者研究与零售监测公司，致力于提供对消费者行为最全面的洞察，并揭示新的增长途径。2023年，NIQ与GfK完成合并，两家极具全球影响力的行业领导者实现整合。NIQ凭借全面的零售解读与消费者洞察，通过卓越的商业智能平台和分析工具， 传递市场全貌（the Full View TM）。

NIQ属于安宏资本（Advent International）的投资组合公司，业务遍及逾百个市场，覆盖全球90%以上的人口。欲了解更多信息，欢迎访问 NIQ.com。
